metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10392 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: mapping0_forward in mapping0.c in Xiph.Org libvorbis 1.3.6 does not validate the number of channels, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow or over-read) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libvorbis package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.6-1').
